Articles.Content:
I\'m presenting the Grumman F-14B 'Tomcat'

NEEDS:

NovaPunch (New Update)

Damned Aerospace 

> 
> In the SPH
> 
> ![screenshot0-1.png](http://i820.photobucket.com/albums/zz126/zack2014/screenshot0-1.png)
> 
> 'CAT' launch (it\'s actually a RATO, but it\'s in place of the Catapult system'
> 
> ![screenshot2-1.png](http://i820.photobucket.com/albums/zz126/zack2014/screenshot2-1.png)
> 
> Just an action shot
> 
> ![screenshot5-1.png](http://i820.photobucket.com/albums/zz126/zack2014/screenshot5-1.png)

Special Instructions:

When launching, wait until you hit 30m/s before activating the rockets, then pitch up.

It will either a) turn into a STOL, about half the runway or ![B)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_cool.png) hit 149m/s at the end and then respond to pitch controls.

ALSO: turn down your roll sensitivity or else you\'re going to snap roll all over the place!!

WARNING: When you\'ve got the drop tanks attached, don\'t let your nose drop below the horizon, or else you have to ditch them early!

Feedback?

(Yes I know the fuselage is wrong, but it looked wrong when I did it MiG style)

DL:[http://www./?aaofb6obqgbk57q](http://www./?aaofb6obqgbk57q)
